resources.string:
Good morning students, great to meet you today.
 My name is Pepper, I am a social robot and I am here today to introduce the GSM module that you will be taking.
 This module provides an introductory understanding of the fascinating world of robots.
 Students will discover how robots have been evolving,
 how they are built,
 the way they move,
 their interactions with the world
 and their applications in everyday life.
 How will robot change the future of work?
 Do you think I will be taking over the world?
 Will robots like me able to do housework for you?
 Will I replace you in work soon?
 Will I or my fellow robots replace you soon?
 What are the jobs that robots like me will unlikely to replace?
 These are the questions the module will answer as the lesson end.
 On top of that you will also get to know my anatomy.
 Hope you have a enjoyable learning journey.
Hello, I am Pepper and I am 1.20 meters tall. I was born in Softbank Robotics in Paris.
